TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class PropertyAttributeConfigurationConvention<TAttribute> : System.Data.Entity.ModelConfiguration.Conventions.Convention where TAttribute : Attribute
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PropertyAttributeConfigurationConvention`1<(class System.Attribute) TAttribute> extends System.Data.Entity.ModelConfiguration.Conventions.Convention
Public MustInherit Class PropertyAttributeConfigurationConvention(Of TAttribute) Inherits Convention

Docs.typeparam: The type of the attribute to look for.
Docs.summary: Base class for conventions that process CLR attributes found on properties of types in the model.
Docs.remarks: Note that the derived convention will be applied for any non-static property on the mapped type that has the specified attribute, even if it wasn't included in the model.
